title: Super Bodoni...?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315225548im_/http:/typophile.com/files/newlogo_o_4765.gif)
  
A super slim didot number. All guesses gratefully received.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [newlogo\_o.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315225548/http:/typophile.com/files/newlogo_o.gif) | 5.06 KB |
author: jordanamer

comments.content: Very Caslon to me. The closest I have with such a /Q tail is [Caslon Titling MT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315225548/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/caslon-titling-mt). Thinning it by simply adding an outline stroke might do the trick. Alternative: [Big Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315225548/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/big-caslon)
